note: This list is compiled from available text fragments and search results. Specific details like exact courses offered within departments (beyond general degree levels), faculty information, and detailed contact numbers for each department are limited in the provided data. Vision and Mission statements are derived from multiple pages and may be slightly paraphrased or summarized. The information about departments on specific campuses is inferred from the address mentioned in the document titles (Airport Road, Kenjar) and the Trust Office address on M.G. Road / Ballabagh. Some departments like the ECE Lab detail are based on templated entries from the provided dataset and require verification. Contact details provided are for the main campus/campus block or the Trust office.
